short_summary: Seeking an engineering consultant for the assessment phase for Arctic Gold and Silver and Venus Mine Site.
description: Duration of contract: ASAP to March 31, 2024. Considerable amount of work has taken place at both sites so the work required for certain phases may not be extensive. The assessment phase of the project will involve at minimum, consideration to some extent the phases provided below. The vendor will work from their own location unless needed on CIRNAC sites, should they require on Government premises, they will be escorted at all times. When the vendor is required to conduct a workshop this may be completed in person at a suitable location proximate to the community of Carcross, and National Aboriginal Health Observatory web-linkon page services National_MEMB-
duration_in_months: )due to months of duration as contract is from ASAP to March 31, 2024
